column5: My place is spacious and has a view of the lake from every room. Youâ€™ll love the outdoors space, the unique architecture, and the relaxing, quiet atmosphere. It's perfect for all. We have sleeping spaces for 5. Also a very large living room to accommodate air mattresses, etc. Only $10/person beyond 5.  I do require that bookings are made by persons age 25 or over. The beach at Little Elm Park is absolutely the best in the Dallas-Ft. Worth Metroplex, and is only 5 minutes away from my house.
